#define freeNET_DATA ( freestru   ) 
Value:
if (freestru->buffer != NULL) { \
        if (freestru->size & tmpNET_BUFSHM) \
          shmdt(freestru->buffer); \
        else if (!(freestru->size & tmpNET_1BUF)) \
          free(freestru->buffer); \
    } \
  free(freestru);

Function Documentation

int tmp_listen ( int  sl_type,
tmpNetwork *  sl_net 
)

Open a socket for listening

Inputs:

  • sl_type: Operation type
    • Types:
      • tmpSTART: Attempt to open a socket for listening
      • tmpSTOP: Close a listeners socket
  • sl_net: Network structure defining local host

Outputs:

  • stat: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error
    • >0 = Informational

References _tmpNetwork::flag, _tmpNetwork::host, msg_tbuf, nm_midx, _tmpNetwork::port, _tmpNetwork::sd, _tmpNetwork::ss, tmpNET_MESSAGE, tmpNET_V4ONLY, tmpNET_V6ONLY, tmpSTART, and tmpSTOP.

Referenced by handle_shutdown(), main(), and register_pcap().

int tmp_listener ( int  ls_sd,
tmpNetwork *  ls_net,
tmpNetwork *  ls_hostlist 
)

Function: tmp_listener

Description:
Accept or reject listen requests

Inputs:

  • ls_sd: Socket descriptor of connection request
  • ls_net: Network structure of local host
  • ls_hostlist: List of allowed remote hosts

Outputs:

  • stat: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error
    • >0 = New socket descriptor for host
  • ls_net->flag & tmpNET_ERRNO = errno if applicable

References _tmpNetwork::addr, _tmpNetwork::flag, msg_tbuf, _tmpNetwork::next, nm_midx, _tmpNetwork::sd, _tmpNetwork::ss, tmp_nstat(), tmpNET_ERRNO, tmpNET_KPALIVE, tmpNET_MESSAGE, tmpNET_NOBLK, tmpNET_ST_DISC, tmpNET_ST_NEW, and tmpNET_ST_UP.

Referenced by main(), and register_pcap().

tmpNetwork *  ss_net 
)

Function: tmp_session

Description:
Establish a session with a remote host

Inputs:

  • ss_type: Operation type
    • tmpSTART: Attempt to establish a session
    • tmpSTOP: Disconnect a session
  • ss_net: Network information structure

Outputs:

  • stat: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error
    • >0 = Informational
